Articles.Content:
Hi!

There is a line in the config saying "canResetNearbyModules = True".

Does that mean the lab should be able to clean Goo Containers and Science Jrs. without docking? If so, what s considered as "nearby", because I tried butting my rover against the lab and couldn't see a reset button?

Or is it just a planned but never finished feature?

Cheers!

What happens when you set it to false?
